name: *Free Demo!* The Coven of Calahree
description:
In a land filled with magic, three witch sisters are about to reawaken the powerful Calahree.  Play out their story as they spread the influence of gluttony throughout the bustling town of Aemple. As their powers GROW just how BIG will anyone get!? Surprises await, as well as rises in weight,  in this wonderful new world from the mind of Bobo the Hobo!

*Rather than make this demo for sale or accept tips, we're making an effort to gather as many Patrons as possible! Please seriously consider signing up to Bobo's Patreon if you'd like to be fist to know when there is a new update to CoC or to even have a chance to be an NPC in the game! Be sure to share this game page with anyone who you think would be interested as well! *

https://www.patreon.com/bobothehobo
